data.name: Revolution 1.4 beta
data.author: Thumblegudget, Bredroll, QuantX
data.description:
This is the 1.4 Beta, with support for more customization.
The Revolution mod brings Radar enhancements, a more immersive fog-of-war for island captures and other enhancements.
* Fog of war * Bomb enemy factories (disabled by default) * Needlefish rebalance (reduced simulated Radar range) * AWACS rebalance (~10-12km max range again for a better feel) * Manta rebalance (less deadly against carriers for more air combat)
For fully details on what the mod does, how you can contribute or request features see [url=https://cc2maps.com/revolution-mod/]https://cc2maps.com/revolution-mod/[/url]
The mod is based on UI Enhancer and Albatross AWACS, so you get those amazing benefits included.
